definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Media guru Yang Lan raises money for Specia.
sentences.chinese: 傳媒大腕楊瀾爲特奧會籌資。

sentences.english: Eunice , today 86 years old, was also present at the games in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 今年86歲高齡的尤妮斯也出席了上海的特奧會。

sentences.english: She is also the first Special Olympics athlete elected to the Special Olympics International board of directors.
sentences.chinese: 她還是第一位被選入特奧會世界理事會的特奧選手。
